siteList.description: Munnar is a town and hill station located in the Idukki district of the southwestern Indian state of Kerala. Munnar is situated at around 1,600 metres above sea-level.
siteList.restriction: Please wear Kerala Traditional attire to get entry into property

siteList.description: Kumarakom is a tourism destination located near the city of Kottayam (10 kilometres (6 mi)), in Kerala, India, known for its backwater tourism.
siteList.restriction: Please wear Kerala Traditional attire to get entry into property
